sentences.en: Buddhism had revolutionized philosophical and religious thought.
sentences.cn: 佛教使哲学和宗教思想发生了根本转变.

sentences.en: But no Soviet leaders can step out of his philosophical skin.
sentences.cn: 但是任何苏联领导人都不会脱掉他的哲学外衣.

sentences.en: Feminist ideas are interrelated with philosophical ideas.
sentences.cn: 女性主义的观点与哲学思想是紧密相连的.

sentences.en: He looked exceedingly tired, but his mood was philosophical.
sentences.cn: 他显得格外疲劳, 但他的心情是镇静的.

sentences.en: His philosophical eyes were obviously shortsighted by the evil influence of Nazism.
sentences.cn: 显然,他那双哲学家般的深邃的眼睛也被纳粹的妖氛所眩惑.

sentences.en: I must vindicate a claim to philosophical reflectiveness.
sentences.cn: 我得作些哲理性的思考了.

sentences.en: Lewis has grown philosophical about life.
sentences.cn: 对于生活，刘易斯变得豁达洒脱了。

sentences.en: Philosophical behaviourists have generally identified mental facts with dispositions to behaviour.
sentences.cn: 哲学行为主义者一般把精神(心理)方面的事实和行为的意向看成一致.

sentences.en: She is very philosophical about her bad luck.
sentences.cn: 她对自己的不幸看得很开.

sentences.en: The phenomenon was so striking and disturbing that his philosophical tranquillity vanished.
sentences.cn: 这个令人惶惑不安的现象,扰乱了他的旷达宁静的心境.

sentences.en: The philosophical perspective is ever the human perspective.
sentences.cn: 哲学观点总是人的看法.

sentences.en: the philosophical problem of whether there is free will
sentences.cn: 关于是否有自由意志的哲学问题

sentences.en: The philosophical problems of chance and of free will are closely related.
sentences.cn: 或然性和自由意志这两个哲学问题是紧密相关的。

sentences.en: The teacher couldn't answer the philosophical problem.
sentences.cn: 老师不能解答这个哲学问题.

sentences.en: They wrote their philosophical nonsense beneath the French original.
sentences.cn: 他们在法国的原著下面写上自己的哲学胡说.

trans.tran_cn: 哲学上的，哲学（家）的，冷静的，沉着的，明达的，达观的
